desc: Enormously boosts OD gauge fill rate for 3 turns

dictionary.lore: A precious flute rumored to hold the fighting spirits of heroes. It is said to heighten the spiritual strength of those who hear it played, and resonate with their souls. However, the flute is fragile and breaks easily, making it extremely difficult to handle. Given its value and fragility, the Akras Summoners' Hall only allows select individuals to handle it.

name: Hero Flute
